name: Tim's Eternal Rest Stop
description:
You've awoken on the back of a giant beast, and a voice in your head is telling you to solve some puzzles.

This is our submission for the June 2021 Summer Slow Jam. Made in UE4.25 in roughly two weeks. Feedback is appreciated!

Available on Windows

NOTE: There is a bug with trying to close the game at the end, just alt-F4 out

PROGRAMMING: Matt
ART: Julian, Mermelada De Pera
VOICE OF TIM: Matt
